participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and introspective, often reflecting on life experiences.
participant_1.background: i am a recovering alcoholic. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i am a 45 year old male. i now live in the city. i grew up on a farm.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: energetic and outgoing, always looking for ways to stay active and socialize.
participant_2.background: i go to the gym regularly. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i've short hair. eating is something i do when i'm bored. two dogs live with me.
